response.summary:
Chemical engineer with experience in maintenance of metallic structures through cathodic protection and corrosion mitigation. Experienced in data processing from indirect assessment of the corrosion state in pipelines and storage tanks through field surveys, elaboration of reports, activities related to CP system design, engineering drawings, and calculations according to the specifications and standards of international organizations such as NACE/AMPP.

Skilled in software tools such as MS Excel, Word, Project, AutoCAD 2D/3D, Matlab, Aspen, Hysys, Simulink, and programming languages such as Visual Basic, HTML, javascript, and CSS styles.
response.skills: Cathodic Protection, Corrosion Protection, Computer-Aided Design (CAD), Process Simulation, Project Engineering, Project Management, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Word, Inspection, Corrosion, Oil & Gas, Corrosion Engineering, Communication, Microsoft Office, Leadership, Customer Service, Management, Teamwork, Problem Solving, Inglés

company.name: Procorr Profesionales en Corrosión SAS
company.description: Somos una empresa colombiana dedicada al desarrollo de proyectos de diseño, instalaciones, montaje y suministro de materiales para sistemas de protección contra la corrosión que se presenta en tuberías, tanques, muelles y demás estructuras sumergidas o enterradas; basados en las normas NACE Internacional y especificaciones propias.
